title: On Lake Merritt in Oakland - Huge Balcony - Luxury View - Pet Friendly
posting_body: Looking for a bigger place with more room to move around, warmth, and amazing natural light?
Love the food, activities, and entertainment around Lake Merritt in Oakland?
Well, check out 1200 Lakeshore Apartments!
We're proud to offer this 1BR / 1.5BA apartment floating above Lake Merritt.
A wall of glass provides amazing natural light and panoramic views of Downtown Oakland, Lake Merritt, the San Francisco Skyline, and the Bay.
The Huge floor plan is 965 s.f. of interior space and 260 s.f. of balcony space making your total indoor-outdoor space is 1,225 s.f. !
These building amenities make life more convenient:
- FREE parking space with each apartment!
- FREE water, sewer, garbage, and natural gas
- 24-hour Package Lockers
- 24-hour Security
- 24-hour Laundry Facility
- 24-hour Business Center
- Mezzanine 4th floor has beautiful outdoor desert garden
- Gym with dry saunas
- Luxurious Community Room
- Available Gigabit Fiber Internet
- Just moments from Lake Merritt BART
To see current availability please visit us at <URL>
Please email or call to schedule your tour today!
